United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 09-1429

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                       RICARDO RODRIGUEZ,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on December 28, 2010 is
amended as follows:

     On page 2, line 16, change "108-130" to "108-135"
